thread.title: O’Dowd congratulates local teachers on winning teaching Oscars (Department of Education)
thread.title_full: O’Dowd congratulates local teachers on winning teaching Oscars (Department of Education) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: O’Dowd congratulates local teachers on winning teaching Oscars (Department of Education)
text: ( Source : Department of Education ) Education Minister , John O'Dowd , congratulates two local teachers on winning gold at the Pearson teaching awards 2015 in recognition of their excellent teaching practices. Dinah MacManus, Holy Family
